data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding & cocos_file.json automatically
Scale9Sprite / Slider / LoadingBar fixes
data.body:
Fixes issues #16930 #16928 

There were different bugs:

* cloning was not supported in the new API. Actually, the previous API was cloning inside the `init` method which was extremely confusing. Added `copyTo` in `Scale9Sprite`
* fix negative streching
* fix bug when calculating centerRect after the texRect was modified

data.title: fix bug, do not add null bone to skin
update CCNode.cpp
data.body:
The _transform property of CCNode would not be restored on setAdditionalTransform(nullptr)
causing in my project a rotation run away ...

data.title: fixed #16938: Audio could not be played entirely on iOS/macOS. And refactored some code of decoding.
Audio still playing app dead.
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: Samsung Galaxy S2, API 15
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r12b
   - Xcode version: 8.1

when i test my game to my phone, background music file like ``background.wav``.
Background music still playing even though the app is dead.
This '.wav' file seems to be causing the problem. zombie background music.
Another phone S3, did not occur. just minor issue on android low API?

data.title: fix crash if scroll to top or left
UIScrollView一滚动，动画就停止了。
data.body:
在iOS平台上面，显示动画的时候，UIScrollView一滚动，动画就停止了。松开手，动画又继续了。
在百度搜索了一些信息，发现说的都是cocos2d的，不是cocos2dx的解决方案。

想问大神们，有办法吗？

data.title: Windows 10 UWP and Windows 8.1 projects updated for v3.14
data.body:
This pull requests updates the winrt libcocos2d to v3.14.
The unsupported x64 build configuration has been removed from the Windows 8.1 projects and templates.

3++

all
- developing environments

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create new project in cocos console 
2. The Example is create with Layer , which is deprecated  long time ago ...

please change it to something valid like sprite or node

data.title: [ci skip]fix url and use https protocol
GetFirstWordLen method breaks line on "no-break" space symbol
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13
environmental and platform independent problem

Steps to Reproduce:

1.  Try to enable word wrapping on label and use symbol of "no-break" space 0xA0 
https://unicodelookup.com/# /1
For example line: "This line contains only nonbreak spaces and no spaces at all" shouldn't be broken by word wrapping. Just like in this text field: -------------------------------------------> "This line contains only nonbreak spaces and no spaces at all".
Problem is in function isUnicodeSpace which is used for word wrapping (but probably shouldn't).

data.title: Audio could not be played entirely on iOS/macOS
data.body:
Reported at http://forum.cocos.com/t/topic/41723

- cocos2d-x version: v3.14
- devices test on: iOS, macOS
- developing environments
   - NDK version: N/A
   - Xcode version: 8.1
   - VS version: N/A
   - browser type and version:N/A

Steps to Reproduce:

Just play this audio [1018.mp3.zip](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/621300/1018.mp3.zip).

There are some frames at the end could not be played.
It seems that audio automatically stops before it's finished.

data.title: [ci skip]disable menu item according different angle of view
[ci skip]remove unneeded test case
Fixes setScale & setAnchorPoint could not work in js-tests -> webview test .
Allows Arbitrary Loads for cpp-tests, js-tests, lua-tests project. removes exception dictionary.
Avoids function name conflict, and uses `http://httpbin.org/gzip` to test gzip functionality since only httpbin.org was added to exception list in Info.plist.
fix issue #16921
Update AssetsManagerEx.cpp
data.body: If we met downloading project.manifest error, we call update again, we need to ```downloadManifest()``` again.

data.title: UILoadingBarTest is broken
data.body: - cocos2d-x version: v3.14 - devices test on: macOS - developing environments - NDK version: N/A - Xcode version: 8.1 - VS version:N/A - browser type and version:N/A Steps to Reproduce: 1. cpp-tests -> 52:Node: UI -> 1: GUI Dynamic Create Test -> 9: LoadingBar Test 2. UILoadingBarTest_Left: The right direction loading bar is missing: Current Result (Wrong): ![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 11 59 13](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20739323/750e5e76-b6f4-11e6-8582-a45bc5a8bb14.png) Expected result: 3. UILoadingBarTest_Left_Scale9 & UILoadingBarTest_Right is broken Current Result (Wrong): ![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 12 00 36](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20739347/a4190400-b6f4-11e6-88e1-6bfdb8630700.png) Expected result: 4. UILoadingBarReloadTexture, Clicking `ToggleScale9` After clicking `ToggleScale9` several times, the display in v3.14 will be wrong. And sometimes the texture is missing after clicking toggle many times. ![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 13 42 03](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20741165/6a13f5d0-b703-11e6-9cbd-ea105ae6858b.png) 5. UILoadingBarReloadTexture, Clicking `ChangeTexture`, the animation of progress is wrong: ![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 13 47 59](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20741249/f8be87fa-b703-11e6-9fb5-cf38a7ce48c4.png) 6. UILoadingBarIssue 12249: (Left: v3.13.1, Right: v3.14) ![loadingbarissue12249](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20741571/21f4860e-b706-11e6-9b14-3d98966f4e07.gif) 7. UILoadingBarTest_Direction: ![screen shot 2016-11-30 at 14 06 47](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/493372/20741693/dbb03232-b706-11e6-9c50-9de8b4232aad.png)
